Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Vercel serverless function for secure OpenAI API integration

Changes:
- Create /api/recommend.js serverless function for backend API calls
- Update frontend to call /api/recommend instead of OpenAI directly
- Remove hardcoded API key from frontend \(now uses environment variables\)
- Add vercel.json configuration for serverless functions
- Add VERCEL_SETUP.md with complete deployment guide

Security improvements:
- API key now stored in Vercel environment variables \(not in code\)
- Serverless function acts as secure backend proxy
- No API key exposure in browser/frontend code
- Production-ready secure architecture

Deployment:
- Deploy to Vercel
- Add OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable in Vercel dashboard
- Set USE_REAL_AI = true in index.html
- API key accessed via process.env.OPENAI_API_KEY on server

This enables real AI recommendations in production while keeping API key secure.
